member.name: TRUSTED_DOMAIN_NAME_INFO
member.summary: The TRUSTED_DOMAIN_NAME_INFO structure is used to query or set the name of a trusted domain. The and functions use this structure when their InformationClass parameters are set to TrustedDomainNameInformation.

member.name: TRUSTED_DOMAIN_NAME_INFO.Name
member.summary: An structure that contains the name of a trusted domain.
